model

Class IPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • visitors.AExtVisitorHost<java.lang.Class<?>,IPiece>
      • model.IPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtVisitorHost<java.lang.Class<?>,IPiece>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuartoPiece

    public abstract class IPiece
extends AExtVisitorHost<java.lang.Class<?>,IPiece>
    Each piece is a host for an extended visitor. The visitor when acting on a piece determines the set of possible moves that the piece can make and thereby produces for each such move a new state of the game.
    Author:
    zpconn

        public abstract java.lang.String getType()
        Each piece has a string identifier. This is used by the view to isolate the appropriate art asset to render the piece in the GUI.
